name: Nantucket Striped Bass with Lemon and Dill
author: leeniesue
summary: Fresh striped bass cooked with lemon and dill. Serve with jasmine rice and shaved cucumber, which complements the dill well.
ingredients: ground black pepper, or to taste
¼ cup bread crumbs, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Place bass in a glass baking pan
Combine lemon juice and 1 tablespoon dill in a small bowl; pour over bass
Marinate at room temperature, at least 10 minutes
Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 8 minutes
Combine the remaining dill, mayonnaise, mustard, and pepper together in a bowl
Mix and smear sauce over the bass
Sprinkle bass with bread crumbs to make crust
Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Broil bass on high until crust is crispy and golden brown, about 3 minutes
